name: Data Kingdom
description:
Welcome to Data Kingdom, your one stop repository for all your project files and assets.

That is, unless Gerald messes everything up AGAIN with a merge conflict. It's your job to command-line-type your way through Data Kingdom and recover your video game studio's lost assets, and perhaps uncover a conspiracy or two along the way.

What the HECK do you do in this game, you ask?

- Solve puzzles and riddles across a digital labyrinth.

- Speak with a variety of interesting characters and acquiesce to their humorous requests.

- Fix GERALD'S stupid mistake. He's getting fired for this I swear

THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 48 HOURS FOR GLOBAL GAME JAM 2021

THE CREATORS:

Davis Canby

Oliver Gallina

Vincent Levy
